## Задание 1. Загрузим данные и пакеты

```{r}
ins_cost <- read.csv('insurance_cost.csv')
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggpubr)
library(plotly)
library(corrplot)
library(corrr)
library(factoextra)
library(dendextend)
library(pheatmap)
library(ggbiplot)
library(FactoMineR)
```





## Задание 2


```{r}
plot_ly(
  data = ins_cost[(ins_cost$bmi != 0) & (ins_cost$charges != 0),],
  x = ~ bmi,
  y = ~ charges,
  color = ~ smoker
)  
```
